titles.title: Requesting the President and directing the Secretary of Defense to transmit, respectively, to the House of Representatives copies of all documents indicating any plans for current or future military assistance to Ukraine and documents indicating whether any United States Armed Forces, including special operations forces, are currently deployed in Ukraine.

Requesting the President and directing the Secretary of Defense to transmit, respectively, to the House of Representatives copies of all documents indicating any plans for current or future military assistance to Ukraine and documents indicating whether any United States Armed Forces, including special operations forces, are currently deployed in Ukraine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 20.
Reported by the Committee on Foreign Affairs. H. Rept. 118-44.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 15.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary: This resolution requests of the President and requires the Department of Defense to provide to the House of Representatives copies of all documents (1) indicating plans for military assistance to Ukraine, and (2) indicating whether any U.S. military forces (including special operations forces) are currently deployed in Ukraine.
